Operating Days :
 *** Saturday - Thursday ***

 Off - Friday

 Schedule : 
 * This schedule is for Sunday-Thursday

 Morning Schedule : b

 Route - 1 : 7.00 am from Agrabad
 Route - 2 : 7.15 am from Station
 Route - 3 : 7.45 am from Station

 Afternoon Schedule : 

 Afternoon route : 1.00 pm from Campus
 Afternoon route : 2.00 pm from Campus

 Evening Schedule : 

 5.05 pm from the Campus

Routes :

 CUET Buses follows three basic routes.

 Route - 1 : Agrabad - Choumuhoni - Dewanhaat - Tiger-Pass - Lalkhan Bazar - WASA - GEC Circle - 2 No. Gate - Technical Moor - Shershah - Can-nment - Oxygen - Noyarhat - Ananya Abashik - CUET (follows the same route while returning - city)

 Route - 2 : Station - Tiger-Pass - Lalkhan Bazar - WASA - GEC Circle - 2 No. Gate - Muradpur - Bohoddarhat - Kaptai Raster Matha - Quaish - CUET (follows the same route while returning - city

 Route - 3 (Teachers and Staff route) : Station - New Market - Ko-wali - Laldighi - Anderkilla - Dewan Bazar - ChawkBazar - KapasGola - Bohoddarhaat - Kaptai Rastar Matha - CUET (follows the same route while returning - city)

Buses :
 1. Padma
 2. Meghna
 3. Jamuna
 4. Rupsha
 5. Ichamoti
 6. Shangu
 7. Tistha
 8. Halda
 9. Matamuhuri
 10. Turaag
 11. Shurma
 12. Gomoti
 13. Buriganga
Only Gomoti Bus will be available at Route No. 1.\m Authority can change the alloted bus to the different routes if necessary. This roaster is only applicable for december month.
